mapper.select: select id, fid, time, heap_use_mem, no_heap_use_mem, use_mem, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user from sys_log_monitor_jvm_status where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log_monitor_jvm_status( id, fid, time, heap_use_mem, no_heap_use_mem, use_mem, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user) values (#{id}, #{fid}, #{time}, #{heapUseMem}, #{noHeapUseMem}, #{useMem}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_log_monitor_jvm_status where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
